name: Spiritboard
description:
A visual novel esque experience where 3 girls play with a spiritboard and end up with a malevolent spirit on their hand. Kinda like watching some friends play with a spiritboard or a magic 8 ball etc. A 3 colour jam project for the pico-8.  

The question menu is controlled with x to go to the top of the menu and c to select. Enter opens the start menu.

To use the paste option on the question menu you must first paste into the game before it can access your clipboard.

Download includes all the .p8 files used to make the project and executables!
